Articles.Content: A little while ago I posted asking for help with a nosecone, which I got sorted thanks to help from guys on the forum. Today I launched my first SRB. It's just a prototype, needs a LOT of work, but it's fun because it is gimbaled. Anyway, thanks and look forward to the part pack my friends and I are planning. If anyone's looking for help, I'm more than glad to share the little I've learned so far.
You left it lying in the incinerator? It looks pretty burnt. Nice start, keep it up!

You left it lying in the incinerator? It looks pretty burnt. Nice start, keep it up!

Haha. I subcontract my texture work and this is just the first he got back to me, so I slapped it on there and launched. Things will only get better from here.
